description: Creation of a professional development plan (15%) and completion of three online WIL modules with summative quizzes (15%). Includes setting placement goals and skill development aligned with career aspirations.

Four-part portfolio: reflection on workplace challenges (10%), self-assessment report (15%), job application responses (15%), and a mock interview (10%). Requires problem-solving, self-reflection, and job application skills.
Evaluation by workplace supervisor assessing professionalism, motivation, initiative, and workplace contribution using a rubric.
